title: Kämpfer für die Liebe (Dub)
alternative_title: けんぷファー für die Liebe
description: A two-episode special. They are designated as Episodes 13 and 14, and the first episode is a direct sequel to the previous series while the second episode is about the trans-sex of Natsuru.
